[vc_row css_animation=”none” banner=”true” el_class=”banner-zinnia” el_id=”home”][vc_column el_class=”res-m-bttm-lg text-center text-lg-left”][vc_single_image image=”1286″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1620507168456{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

The World’s 1st Dog Themed Token That Rewards You, Whilst Giving Dogs a Home

If you like Doge, then you’ll fall in love with Kabosu

  • BUY KABOSU
  • VIEW CHART
  • CHECK BSCSCAN

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none” el_id=”about” css=”.vc_custom_1620803375842{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”section-pad about-section no-pb section-bg”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Who is Kabosu?

Kabosu (Japanese: かぼす) is a female Shiba Inu most famously known as the face of Doge.

Kabosu was born in November 2nd, 2005 in a Japanese pedigree puppy mill that was promptly shut down, leaving Kabosu stranded in one of Japan’s many animal shelters. The owner of Kabosu, Atsuko Sato, rescued her in 2008, saving her from certain death at the hands of humanity. Her name was given by a shelter volunteer – Kabosu is a type of fruit and said rescue worker mentioned that her face was very round, just like the fruit.

The goal of Kabosu is to prevent dogs of all breeds from being abandoned. For this reason we will be making weekly donations to community chosen dog charities!

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”1435″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” css_animation=”none”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”yes” el_class=”section-pad token-sale-section section-bg-zinnia” el_id=”tokenomics”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Liquidity

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1620801691078{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;background-image: url(https://kabosutoken.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/background-1.png?id=1407) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”roadmap” el_class=”section-pad about-section no-pb section-bg”][vc_column el_class=”res-m-bttm”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Our Roadmap

[/vc_column_text]

STAGE 1

- Core Development
- Launch
- Marketing (ads/influencers)
- Begin adoption platform development and testing
- Coingecko Application
- CoinMarketCap Application
- Blockfolio Application

STAGE 2

- Establish a partnership network that is bound to make KABOSU conquer the cryptosphere
- CEX Application
- NFT auctions to fund bigger scale donations
- KABOSU Social Platform Beta release
- Staking options for KABOSU holders

STAGE 3

- Larger scale marketing
- Additional CEX Applications
- KABOSU Social Platform Full release

STAGE 4

- Binance Listing
- World Domination

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-zinnia text-center”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1620829700345{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”]

Join Our Community

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

We are a new project but positive news about us is travelling fast. Be sure to join our communities to keep up-to-date and find out how you can get involved.
See you soon!
